What's wrong!?\""},{"lineNumber":25657,"originalJapaneseLine":"休憩していたコルドバの耳に、","translatedEnglishLine":"Cordoba, who was resting, heard"},{"lineNumber":25658,"originalJapaneseLine":"絶叫のような喚声が聞こえてきたのは、","translatedEnglishLine":"a scream-like shout,"},{"lineNumber":25659,"originalJapaneseLine":"日が落ちてしばらくの事だった。","translatedEnglishLine":"some time after the sun had set."},{"lineNumber":25660,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しょ、将軍！　お休みのところ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"G-General! Sorry to disturb you while resting...\""},{"lineNumber":25661,"originalJapaneseLine":"「何があった、言え！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What happened? Tell me!\""},{"lineNumber":25662,"originalJapaneseLine":"従者の前置きを肉厚な声で粉砕しつつ、","translatedEnglishLine":"Dismissing his attendant's preamble with a thick voice,"},{"lineNumber":25663,"originalJapaneseLine":"コルドバはすぐさま青鎧を着込みはじめた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Cordoba immediately began donning his blue armor."},{"lineNumber":25664,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はっ……敵襲です！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes... It's an enemy assault!"},{"lineNumber":25665,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それも、昼間より数段激しく……」","translatedEnglishLine":"And it's several times fiercer than during the day...\""},{"lineNumber":25666,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ち……懲りない連中だ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Damn... These fools never learn!"},{"lineNumber":25667,"originalJapaneseLine":"　全員起こせぇ！　籠城戦だ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Wake everyone up! Prepare for a siege battle!\""},{"lineNumber":25668,"originalJapaneseLine":"慌ただしく、夜を徹しての防衛戦が始まった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Hurriedly, the night-long defense battle began."},{"lineNumber":25669,"originalJapaneseLine":"「かがり火、置けー！　見張り、確認を怠るな！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Place the bonfires! Watchmen, don't neglect your vigilance!\""},{"lineNumber":25670,"originalJapaneseLine":"夜のニクラス砦に、かがり火が追加で焚かれ始めた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Additional bonfires began to be lit at Nikuras Fortress during the night."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ハハハハハ、厄介なやつらめ……ハハハ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hahaha, troublesome fellows... hahaha."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍は撤退していき、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army began to withdraw,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス軍は砦の中に引き上げていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the Leazas forces retreated into the fortress.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くふふふふ……中々耐えるが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kufufufu... they endure well, but,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 所詮、その数ではね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: in the end, with those numbers..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍を率いる魔物将軍が、薄く嗤った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon general leading the demon army sneered faintly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ご覧になっておられますか、ヨシフ様！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Are you watching, Lord Yosif!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勝利は目前です。さすれば…………」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Victory is at hand. And then..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本来の規模からすれば、小競り合いの範疇にある
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In terms of scale, this battle was just a minor skirmish,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この戦いに、魔物大将軍ヨシフが訪れていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but the demon grand general Yosif had come to this fight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わざわざ御足労願いましてありがとうございます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Thank you for making the effort to come here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この勝利を、ヨシフ閣下に捧げんと思いまして」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I intend to dedicate this victory to you, Lord Yosif."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ワタクシ、地図を見るのは得意な方でして。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I am somewhat skilled at reading maps.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの古臭い砦、ただ置かれているだけに見えますが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That old-fashioned fortress looks like it's just sitting there,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 実のところそうではございません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but in reality, that's not the case."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この地はノースへの道に通じており、王都リーザスとカーソンの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This land leads to the road to North, and it can sever communications between the royal capital Leazas and Carson.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 連絡が分断できます。これだけでも輸送路には痛手ですが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even this alone would be a serious blow to the supply routes...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「更に南下すればＬ.Ｃ.Ｍ連山の、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Furthermore, if we push further south, we can control

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 東側ルートを押さえる事が可能なのです！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the eastern route of the L.C.M mountain range!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうなれば、リーザス側はこの山を侵攻ルートとして使うのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If that happens, Leazas will no longer be able to use this mountain as an invasion route.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もはや不可能でございます。あとは王都を狙うのみ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It will be impossible. After that, we only have to aim for the royal capital..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だというのにあんなちっぽけな砦ひとつで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yet they try to defend such a tiny fortress.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 守ろうとは。愚かなものです。くふふ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Foolish creatures. Kufufu."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ご覧ください、閣下！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Behold, Your Excellency!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このワタクシが、リーザスに……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I, myself, will take Leazas...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「遅い」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You're late."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はえ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 部下の長口舌を、ヨシフの一言が断ち切った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yosif's single word cut off his subordinate's long-winded speech.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その砦が狙い目というのは、まぁよかろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's fine that you see that fortress as the target.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが儂は忙しい。さっさとカタをつけろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But I am busy. Wrap this up quickly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、ははっ……大丈夫でございます、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hahaha... it'll be fine,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あと一週間もあれば……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: if we have even one more week..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今日中だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "By the end of today."
"Huh!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「明日の朝日が上がるまでに終わらせろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Finish before tomorrow's sunrise.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どのような手を使っても、だ。よいな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Use whatever means necessary. Understood?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ……え、えと、し、しかしですね……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah... uh, b-but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本日の出撃は、もう…………
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Today's sortie has already...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: できましたら、援軍など頂ければと…………」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If possible, we could use reinforcements..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「成功すれば良し。失敗すれば悪し。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Success is good. Failure is bad.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 儂は平等だぞ。……有能にも、無能にもな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I treat both equally... whether competent or incompetent."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さあて……そろそろ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well then... it's about time

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: フルルに書く手紙を用意せんと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I prepare the letter I'm going to write to Fururu..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……なんだ、どうした！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...What is it? What's wrong!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 休憩していたコルドバの耳に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cordoba, who was resting, heard

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 絶叫のような喚声が聞こえてきたのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a scream-like shout,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 日が落ちてしばらくの事だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: some time after the sun had set.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しょ、将軍！　お休みのところ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "G-General! Sorry to disturb you while resting..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「何があった、言え！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What happened? Tell me!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 従者の前置きを肉厚な声で粉砕しつつ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Dismissing his attendant's preamble with a thick voice,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コルドバはすぐさま青鎧を着込みはじめた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cordoba immediately began donning his blue armor.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はっ……敵襲です！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes... It's an enemy assault!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それも、昼間より数段激しく……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And it's several times fiercer than during the day..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ち……懲りない連中だ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Damn... These fools never learn!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全員起こせぇ！　籠城戦だ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wake everyone up! Prepare for a siege battle!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 慌ただしく、夜を徹しての防衛戦が始まった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hurriedly, the night-long defense battle began.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「かがり火、置けー！　見張り、確認を怠るな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Place the bonfires! Watchmen, don't neglect your vigilance!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 夜のニクラス砦に、かがり火が追加で焚かれ始めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Additional bonfires began to be lit at Nikuras Fortress during the night.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

It's an enemy assault!"},{"lineNumber":25665,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それも、昼間より数段激しく……」","translatedEnglishLine":"And it's several times fiercer than during the day...\""},{"lineNumber":25666,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ち……懲りない連中だ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Damn... translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ハハハハハ、厄介なやつらめ……ハハハ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hahaha, troublesome fellows... hahaha."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍は撤退していき、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army began to withdraw,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス軍は砦の中に引き上げていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the Leazas forces retreated into the fortress.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くふふふふ……中々耐えるが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kufufufu... they endure well, but,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 所詮、その数ではね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: in the end, with those numbers..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍を率いる魔物将軍が、薄く嗤った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon general leading the demon army sneered faintly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ご覧になっておられますか、ヨシフ様！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Are you watching, Lord Yosif!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勝利は目前です。さすれば…………」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Victory is at hand. And then..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本来の規模からすれば、小競り合いの範疇にある
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In terms of scale, this battle was just a minor skirmish,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この戦いに、魔物大将軍ヨシフが訪れていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but the demon grand general Yosif had come to this fight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わざわざ御足労願いましてありがとうございます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Thank you for making the effort to come here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この勝利を、ヨシフ閣下に捧げんと思いまして」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I intend to dedicate this victory to you, Lord Yosif."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ワタクシ、地図を見るのは得意な方でして。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I am somewhat skilled at reading maps.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの古臭い砦、ただ置かれているだけに見えますが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That old-fashioned fortress looks like it's just sitting there,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 実のところそうではございません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but in reality, that's not the case."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この地はノースへの道に通じており、王都リーザスとカーソンの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This land leads to the road to North, and it can sever communications between the royal capital Leazas and Carson.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 連絡が分断できます。これだけでも輸送路には痛手ですが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even this alone would be a serious blow to the supply routes...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「更に南下すればＬ.Ｃ.Ｍ連山の、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Furthermore, if we push further south, we can control

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 東側ルートを押さえる事が可能なのです！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the eastern route of the L.C.M mountain range!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうなれば、リーザス側はこの山を侵攻ルートとして使うのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If that happens, Leazas will no longer be able to use this mountain as an invasion route.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もはや不可能でございます。あとは王都を狙うのみ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It will be impossible. After that, we only have to aim for the royal capital..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だというのにあんなちっぽけな砦ひとつで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yet they try to defend such a tiny fortress.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 守ろうとは。愚かなものです。くふふ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Foolish creatures. Kufufu."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ご覧ください、閣下！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Behold, Your Excellency!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このワタクシが、リーザスに……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I, myself, will take Leazas...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「遅い」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You're late."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はえ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 部下の長口舌を、ヨシフの一言が断ち切った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yosif's single word cut off his subordinate's long-winded speech.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その砦が狙い目というのは、まぁよかろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's fine that you see that fortress as the target.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが儂は忙しい。さっさとカタをつけろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But I am busy. Wrap this up quickly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、ははっ……大丈夫でございます、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hahaha... it'll be fine,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あと一週間もあれば……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: if we have even one more week..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今日中だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "By the end of today."
"Huh!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「明日の朝日が上がるまでに終わらせろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Finish before tomorrow's sunrise.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どのような手を使っても、だ。よいな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Use whatever means necessary. Understood?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ……え、えと、し、しかしですね……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah... uh, b-but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本日の出撃は、もう…………
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Today's sortie has already...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: できましたら、援軍など頂ければと…………」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If possible, we could use reinforcements..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「成功すれば良し。失敗すれば悪し。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Success is good. Failure is bad.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 儂は平等だぞ。……有能にも、無能にもな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I treat both equally... whether competent or incompetent."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さあて……そろそろ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well then... it's about time

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: フルルに書く手紙を用意せんと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I prepare the letter I'm going to write to Fururu..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……なんだ、どうした！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...What is it? What's wrong!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 休憩していたコルドバの耳に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cordoba, who was resting, heard

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 絶叫のような喚声が聞こえてきたのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a scream-like shout,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 日が落ちてしばらくの事だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: some time after the sun had set.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しょ、将軍！　お休みのところ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "G-General! Sorry to disturb you while resting..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「何があった、言え！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What happened? Tell me!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 従者の前置きを肉厚な声で粉砕しつつ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Dismissing his attendant's preamble with a thick voice,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コルドバはすぐさま青鎧を着込みはじめた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cordoba immediately began donning his blue armor.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はっ……敵襲です！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes... It's an enemy assault!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それも、昼間より数段激しく……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And it's several times fiercer than during the day..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ち……懲りない連中だ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Damn... These fools never learn!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全員起こせぇ！　籠城戦だ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wake everyone up! Prepare for a siege battle!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 慌ただしく、夜を徹しての防衛戦が始まった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hurriedly, the night-long defense battle began.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「かがり火、置けー！　見張り、確認を怠るな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Place the bonfires! Watchmen, don't neglect your vigilance!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 夜のニクラス砦に、かがり火が追加で焚かれ始めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Additional bonfires began to be lit at Nikuras Fortress during the night.
